DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : CHINA
DOC.TEXT: Trade_Deficit Narrows : A surge in exports reduced the trade_deficit for the first five months of the year to $ 1.79 billion from $ 3.07 billion a year earlier , major Chinese newspapers reported Friday . Exports during the period soared 24.1 % to $ 37.49 billion , and imports rose 18.1 % to $ 39.28 billion , the official China Daily said , citing a Customs Administration report . By the end of May , the deficit was $ 1.27 billion less at than at that point last year , the paper said .
